extDes.message: FaWave, is a Chrome extension supporting multiple microblogging, which can make all microblogs synchronously updating, work seamlessly across multiple microblogs when you switch between them. Feedback to @QLeelulu .

sett_itemName_g_refresh_time.description: 全局的获取信息间隔时间

sett_jTip_g_refresh_time.message: Here set the refresh interval is global, if you need a specific account for specific settings, go to "Account Settings" to customize the settings. For example: 30 seconds refresh Sina minimum, while the Twitter API requests per hour is 150, so 30 seconds refresh Twitter will certainly exceed the limit, over the limit will be wrong. So Twitter account can go to "Account Settings" to customize the settings. The API requests the account specific frequency limits can click the "View API request limit state" to view. The minimum is 30 seconds can be set
sett_jTip_g_refresh_time.description: 全局的获取信息间隔说明

sett_des_g_refresh_time_hits.message: (The refresh interval is currently set number of requests generated per hour at：request per hour)

sett_jTip_quick_send_key.message:
In all of the pages, you can use the shortcut key you set to pop-up the interface to send out tweet, fast and lightweight. Change the shortcut keys and saved, will take effect after refresh the page.
Tip: Select text on the page, and then press the shortcut key to pop-up the interface to send out tweet that will automatically fill the selected text to the input box.

sett_des_account_password.description: 添加用户的时候填写密码

sett_jTip_account_auth_type.message:
Authentication Type Description:
Basic Auth: convenient, but the user name and password stored locally.
oAuth: to the authorized site get the authorization code, more secure, recommended. (Local only stored authorization code)
xAuth: oAuth simplified way, directly enter the user password authentication, but the user password is not stored locally.
sett_jTip_account_auth_type.description: 添加用户的时候选择验证类型时的提示说明

sett_jTip_manage_accounts.message:
Account Status: "enable" the account can view and send tweet. "Send only" account can not see, only when sending tweet can choose to sync sent. "Disabled" account can neither see nor can simultaneously send, please just do not want to manage your account temporarily, when it is set to "disabled".
refresh interval: here set the refresh rate override "Interval to obtain information" settings inside "basic settings", where you can set specific for a particular account of the refresh time interval, without affecting other accounts using the global settings. You can set the minimum value of 30 seconds. Figures in brackets refer to the current global setting, enter "0" means use global settings.
account sort: dragging account picture can be sort.
Save: all operations will be automatically saved after your operation.

sett_jTip_WH_width_limit.message: width limit: width limit is 800, and then will not change the size of a larger.

sett_itemName_WH_height_limit.message: height limit: height of more than about 570-580, will lead to failure of the scroll bar.

sett_jTip_shared_template.message:
Available parameters and description:
When you use the "I'm watching" feature, will generate the final content based on this template.
template parameter must be wrapped up by "{{}}", the available parameters are:

{{url}}: You are currently browsing the Web url

{{title}}: You are currently browsing the page title
